name: Marizul Slayer of Demons
description:
(Note: This game was created for the Epic Megajam 2022)
Theme: As Above, so Below

Gameplay:
Take turns playing as the demon hunter, Marizul, and her guardian angel to slay demons. The first stage you fight off an assault of pesky demons while defending powerful relics. Afterwards, you will play as Marizul and take down one of hell's strongest champions.

Controls: 

WASD for movement
Mouse for Camera movement
Left Shift for Speed Boost/Dash
Space for jumps
Escape for menu/pause

Angel:
Left click (Shoot orb)
Right click (Shoot beam)

Demon Hunter:
Left click (Shoot Gun)
Right click (Aim)


Made with Unreal Engine 5.0.3
